items.sentence: Tom and Mary will probably not tell John about what they did.
Tom appears to be too tired to tackle that problem right now.
Tom asked Mary if she was planning to go to Boston with John.
I\'m pretty sure Tom didn\'t know I wasn\'t going to do that.
Tom doesn\'t quite get it. Could you explain it to him again?
How much do you pay each year for your children\'s education?
Tom should\'ve known better than to call Mary after midnight.
Explain yourself clearly so that you won\'t be misunderstood.
Tom must\'ve been the one who added Mary\'s name to the list.
Tom didn\'t tell me that he didn\'t have a driver\'s license.
Tom knows why Mary decided not to go on the picnic with John.
Tom lit the candle with a match, and then blew out the match.
Why don\'t you just call Tom and tell him you can\'t do that?
It\'s going to be difficult to do that without a lot of help.
It\'s unlikely that Tom will ever learn to play the mandolin.
Tom was surprised to see how skimpy Mary\'s new swimsuit was.
Tom claims that he was in Boston the night Mary was murdered.
I assure you that an error like this will never happen again.
I can walk from my house to the station in only five minutes.
I\'m not going to pretend that I don\'t want to go to Boston.
I know it would be useless to try to convince Tom to do that.
I lived in Boston a few years ago, but now I live in Chicago.
Most people don\'t really believe everything politicians say.
Mary and Tom are twins, but they don\'t look like each other.
Many cancer patients lose their hair because of chemotherapy.
Please be on time. If you\'re late, we\'ll leave without you.
The police are convinced Tom didn\'t die from natural causes.
Tom couldn\'t read very well until he was thirteen years old.
I could hear the sound of children playing outside my window.
Tom said Mary was driving the car when the accident happened.
By the time Tom realized what was happening, it was too late.
There\'s a rumor going around that you kissed Tom last night.
Tom was waiting for Mary in front of the library all morning.
Tom would never forgive himself if anything happened to Mary.
If I\'m not mistaken, I think I\'ve met you somewhere before.
If you don\'t want to attend the meeting, you don\'t have to.
You never really wanted to go to the dance with Tom, did you?
You should get Tom to tell you the joke he told me yesterday.
It\'s easy to understand why Tom wasn\'t allowed to go there.
I can\'t believe I actually have that much money in the bank.
Tom walked into the courtroom, surrounded by police officers.
Tom was gagged and tied to a chair when the police found him.
Tom said he might come to Boston next week or the week after.
Tom wanted to finish cleaning the house before Mary got home.
Tom couldn\'t fall asleep because he was thinking about Mary.
Tom decided that it wasn\'t necessary to pay that bill today.
You would\'ve gotten away with it if Tom hadn\'t told on you.
I didn\'t tell you because I thought you weren\'t interested.
Tom was the first one to realize that Mary wanted to do that.
The Christmas party won\'t be the same this year without Tom.
